entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
